text: @NYGovCuomo @TheDemCoalition What about you quietly killing the #vaping industry by banning them in your state ? What do you have to say about making another 20k #vape workers  #unemployed so you can keep that Big Tobacco #msabloodmoney flowing in #NewYork ? #coronavirus #wevapewevote
